list.name: Changes
list.comment:
WORKING AS EXPECTED!!
Update task handling and UI elements
Enhanced task alignment logic for DE and non-DE URLs in `exe_tasks.py` to include keyboard simulation. Added task counter feature in `bAUTOnizer3000_stable.py` to track and display the number of scheduled tasks dynamically. Removed unnecessary components and adjusted configurations in `.idea/workspace.xml`.

task.summary:
Add field clear action and initial .idea config files
The commit introduces a section to app's "Hinzufügen" tab to clear field inputs. The `.idea` config files necessary for a Python project setup in JetBrains IDE are also generated and added in the commit. The new files manage project settings, module information, VCS mappings, and ignored files, amongst other configurations.

Add field clear action and initial .idea config files
The commit introduces a section to app's "Hinzufügen" tab to clear field inputs. The `.idea` config files necessary for a Python project setup in JetBrains IDE are also generated and added in the commit. The new files manage project settings, module information, VCS mappings, and ignored files, amongst other configurations.

Coders Note: Hiding buttons finally fucking works! But now each button is added multiple times, working on that next.
Add field clear action and initial .idea config files
The commit introduces a section to app's "Hinzufügen" tab to clear field inputs. The `.idea` config files necessary for a Python project setup in JetBrains IDE are also generated and added in the commit. The new files manage project settings, module information, VCS mappings, and ignored files, amongst other configurations.

Coders Note: Hiding buttons finally fucking works! But now each button is added multiple times, working on that next.
Add field clear action and initial .idea config files
The commit introduces a section to app's "Hinzufügen" tab to clear field inputs. The `.idea` config files necessary for a Python project setup in JetBrains IDE are also generated and added in the commit. The new files manage project settings, module information, VCS mappings, and ignored files, amongst other configurations.
gui is working as it should, try to reorder layout

Add clear input checkbox and increase window height
Re-ordered the imports in bAUTOnizer3000.py and increased the window height to better accommodate elements. Added a new clear input checkbox that when checked, clears all input fields. This gives the user the flexibility to clear or retain input field data. The change also includes some updates in .idea/workspace.xml.

Add 'Clear Input' checkbox and modify UI elements
This commit adds a 'Clear Input' checkbox to the interface and increases the window's height for better accommodation of elements. Also, some formatting adjustments have been made in the Python file, while new options have been added in the .idea config files.

Refactor field attributes in bAUTOnizer3000.py
This commit modifies the field attributes in the add_image_and_link_fields function in bAUTOnizer3000.py to use self references. It also brings minor updates to the .idea/workspace.xml configuration.

Refactor field attributes in bAUTOnizer3000.py
This commit modifies the field attributes in the add_image_and_link_fields function in bAUTOnizer3000.py to use self references. It also brings minor updates to the .idea/workspace.xml configuration.

Refactor code and add new features in bAUTOnizer3000.py
last commit pre holiday
This commit refactors existing code to make it more organized and readable, removing redundant lines and outdated comments. It also introduces new features such as specific inputs for articles, brands (marken) and categories, along with debug statements for tracking these changes. Minor updates to the .idea/workspace.xml configuration file are also included.

Refactor DatePickerDialog and task creation
The DatePickerDialog class was refactored for better readability with layout creation broken down into individual methods. Task creation was also adjusted to make use of

Update the script with UI enhancements
The script is now updated to efficiently manage tasks and improve user interaction. Main changes include reordering of imported modules, creation of DatePickerDialog and TimePickerDialog classes, addition of more fields on the UI for better task input, and inclusion of useful debugging statements. This also involves restructuring of methods for clearer code hierarchy and preventing repetitive code, and the addition of more helper functions for specific actions. The script also includes new features such as task creation confirmation banner and glowing border animation to improve user experience and provide immediate feedback.

Remove Qodana config, add temp.py, large exe_tasks update
Removed outdated Qodana configuration file. Added a new Python script (temp.py) for task counter implementation. Major refactoring of exe_tasks.py to enhance functionality, including task-specific processing and improved article handling.

WORKING AS EXPECTED!!
Update task handling and UI elements
Enhanced task alignment logic for DE and non-DE URLs in `exe_tasks.py` to include keyboard simulation. Added task counter feature in `bAUTOnizer3000_stable.py` to track and display the number of scheduled tasks dynamically. Removed unnecessary components and adjusted configurations in `.idea/workspace.xml`.

Update the script with UI enhancements
The script is now updated to efficiently manage tasks and improve user interaction. Main changes include reordering of imported modules, creation of DatePickerDialog and TimePickerDialog classes, addition of more fields on the UI for better task input, and inclusion of useful debugging statements. This also involves restructuring of methods for clearer code hierarchy and preventing repetitive code, and the addition of more helper functions for specific actions. The script also includes new features such as task creation confirmation banner and glowing border animation to improve user experience and provide immediate feedback.

Add task counters and tab-specific instances
Introduced counters for currently scheduled tasks and separated instances for each tab, allowing for better management of add and remove functionalities. Ensured appropriate clearing of fields based on the active tab and updated debug statements accordingly.

Remove Qodana config, add temp.py, large exe_tasks update
Removed outdated Qodana configuration file. Added a new Python script (temp.py) for task counter implementation. Major refactoring of exe_tasks.py to enhance functionality, including task-specific processing and improved article handling.

WORKING AS EXPECTED!!

Added task counter feature in `bAUTOnizer3000_stable.py` to track and display the number of scheduled tasks dynamically. Removed unnecessary components and adjusted configurations in `.idea/workspace.xml`.
